title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 602.3 - Boundary amendment criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 602.3 - Boundary amendment criteria

State Regulations

The secretary shall amend the coastal area boundary whenever
the Secretary finds that: (a) an
amendment would correct an error in the existing boundary; or
(b) an amendment would be in furtherance of
the policies and purposes of article 42 of the Executive Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
602.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
